title: Basic LCD Wear Watch Face
summary: Basic LCD display Wear Watch face.
developerAddress:
AdminExcellence Limited trading as Wearable Designs
The Castle House
Newnham
Gloucestershire
GL14 1AE
description: A Basic clear LCD display type Wear Watch face using 24 hour clock.This Watchface has been optimised for Devices which go to an ambient mode such as the Sony Smart Watch 3. Usage:Download from here and the watch face will appear in the Google Wear app and then on the Wear Device. You may need to resync wear apps in the Google Wear app for the Watchface to appear on the Wear Device.
descriptionHTML:
A Basic clear LCD display type Wear Watch face using 24 hour clock.

This Watchface has been optimised for Devices which go to an ambient mode such as the Sony Smart Watch 3.

Usage:

Download from here and the watch face will appear in the Google Wear app and then on the Wear Device. You may need to resync wear apps in the Google Wear app for the Watchface to appear on the Wear Device.
comments: Gr8 retro look People think you got an old fashioned watch until you touch the screen
A clean, simple, and realistic LCD face. For what it is, it's pretty much perfect.
